Rules

General Rules

  • No cheating or exploiting - Use of bugs, menu or scripts or anything to gain advantage is not allowed.
  • No arguing or impersonating or excessively pestering staff.
  • You must finish any RP you are involved with no matter what.
  • Act civil and don't act disrespectful
  • No Meta gamming, No Power gamming, No Revenge Killing, No Combat Logging
  • No killing without cause, reason or rp
  • No Meta gamming, No Power gamming, No Revenge Killing
  • No breaking character
  • No erotic Role-play at all
  • Whitelisted employees must be within the LTRP discord whilst on duty, this could be a general channel or your own job channel
  • No idle farming or afk farming, you MUST log off if you're going AFK for an extended period of time, if you're found to be farming a pay check your money may be set to $0.00.

Character Rules

  • Logic - You must always thing logically when you're in a situation, this is a role-play
  • You must value your life - Not valuing your life may get you kicked and or told that you must delete your character
  • You can not kill someone after you rob them
  • Terrorist RP is not allowed
  • Sniper RP is allowed, HOWEVER, you MUST declare that there is a sniper, whether this is by voice or via twitter, you may not start randomly shooting with no real RP behind it
  • Suicide - If you wish to RP as suicidal should you actual commit suicide or say you are dead you will be required to delete your character. This is also known as "/me no pulse"

Other

  • When robbing an officer/EMS, You can only take the items that they currently have on them
